title: Can't buy Kalista?
body: Kalista is not available in the shop and cannot be bought through the profile menu either, what's going on?

replies.body:
Hi guys,

There was an issue with getting her made available immediately, but we're pleased to say that she is now in store and ready for battle.
not sure if this has been resolved but i can purchase her.

Kalista and her files have been implemented in patch 4.20 but like every other new champion that comes along will take just a bit more time before the purchase function of said champion is activated. But she should be available soon. 

Good luck Summoner! 
lols =)
Oce staff... I get that anyone makes mistakes but could't they atleast keep us informed as to what is going on?
